text: Janine Charrat (24 July 1924 - 29 August 2017) was a French dancer and choreographer. She was born in Grenoble, France. She appeared in Ballerina at the age of 12, and went on to choreograph over 50 ballets. She was an officer of the Legion of Honour. Charrat died on 29 August 2017 in Paris at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French dancers Category:Ballerinas Category:People from Grenoble
title: Janine Charrat
